Besides liners, Asoe also supplies complete solutions and accessory equipment, including couplings, equipments and technical consulting etc.

(Tyrannosaurus)垃圾预处理系统，把固体废弃物 (生活垃圾、工业垃圾、商业垃圾等)经过破碎、分选 等工艺，处理成为高质量的、均匀的燃料(SRF, Solid Recovered Fuel,固体回收燃料，在欧洲是有标准的 燃料)，可以替代化石燃料，供循环流化床锅炉或水泥 窑使用。预处理工艺将所有垃圾破碎成80 - 100mm的 粒径，分选出含铁金属和有色金属，分选出不可燃的物 料，如玻璃、石头、陶瓷等等，生产出高质量的燃料。
The Tyrannosaurus waste pre-treatment system from BMH Environmental Protection Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. turns solid waste (MSW, industrial and commercial waste), through the shredding and separation process, into high quality, homogeneous fuel (Solid Recovered Fuel, SRF, which has certain standards in the Europe). SRF is a replacement of fossil fuel and can be used by the CFB boiler and cement kiln. The target of the pre-treatment process is to reduce waste particle size into 80-100mm, separate the ferrous and non-ferrous metal, and separate the non-combustible fraction, such as glass, stone and ceramics to produce high quality fuel.

Enwise provides dry anaerobic digestion system that transforms organic waste into energy and fertilizer while maintaining a compact modular design. It is installed on-site and locally processes organic waste as it is produced. which is a unique combination of hardware, software, and high-efficiency digesters. By using our technology, you gain a convenient source of organic fertilizers and biogas while disposing of your waste. Most importantly, we offer modules that channel the energy from the biogas towards creating hot water, cool water, steam, or electricity.

GEH灿sserchemie是一家颗粒氢氧化铁的发明者 和制造商。致力于全球领先饮用水的除碑处理技术。 GEH®是为选择性去除饮用水中的碑而研发新方法，目 前此法也适用于其他应用领域。这些领域涉及矿泉水、 雨水、地表水和废水的水处理工艺。除碑外，我司的产 品还可以去除帆、铀或磷酸盐等杂质。
GEH Wasserchemie is inventor and manufacturer of granular ferric hydroxide (GEH®). Today we are the world-leading provider of iron-based adsorbents for water treatment. Developed for the selective removal of arsenic from drinking water, GEH® is today also used for many other applications. These include the treatment of mineral water, rainwater, surface water and waste water. In addition to arsenic, impurities like vanadium, uranium or phosphate are removed. We create project-specific designs including capacity estimation and advise on the construction and operation of adsorption systems.

Hong Kong Trade Development Council (HKTDC) is a statutory body established in 1966 to promote, assist and develop Hong Kong's trade. With 50 offices globally, including 13 in Mainland China, HKTDC promotes Hong Kong as a two-way global investment and business hub. HKTDC organises international exhibitions, conferences and business missions to create business opportunities for companies, particularly small and medium-sized enterprises. HKTDC also provides up-to-date market insights and product information via trade publications, research reports and digital news channels.
展台 Booth No. W2 F99
华沃德源环境技术（济南）有限公司 HONORWOOD ENVIRONMENTAL TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.
电话 Tel.: 86 139 5316 8531
网址 Website: www.honorwood.cn
华沃德源环境技术（济南）有限公司是一家以生物技 术为核心的科技型创新公司。公司拥有国际领先的“第 三代生物环保技术”以及优秀的专业技术团队，在工业 废水处理、环境水体修复、有机废弃物降解、土壤改良 修复等领域为客户提供技术咨询、工艺设计、设备与产 品的采购与集成、工程实施、托管运营、技术咨询等一 站式专业化服务。第三代生物环保技术——“菌+酶+ 益生元的复合制剂”是近年来推出的新型生物技术。该 复合制剂包括好氧、厌氧、硝化、反硝化等微生物，而 且含有丰富的酶，以及营养物质和矿物盐。酶制剂可直 接作用于脂肪、蛋白、纤维素等底物，将大分子物质变 为小分子物质，发挥直接、迅速的效果。再通过微生物 实现降解。营养物质的加入强化了处理系统中的营养平 衡，使微生物和酶在诸多不利条件下（如废水可生化性 差、水质变化大、水量变化大等），均能保持高效的生 物活性和作用效果。

NKE Instrumentation公司专业设计，制造和销售用于 监测海洋和淡水的仪器。NKE Instrumentation的首要 任务是通过开发智能高科技产品来参与对地球蓝肺的 了解。其应用领域包括河流，湖泊，河口，海洋和深 海。公司有三种不同的产品范围：水下监测仪器，旨在 现场测量淡水和海水的主要理化参数。浮标和仪表系统 旨在在任何类型的环境中测量，传输和检索数据。剖面 浮标用于海洋和气候演变的海洋学和环境研究。NKE Instrumentation参与了国际ARGO计划，以提供温度 和盐度剖面浮标。NKE Instrumentation是水监测解决 方案的领先提供商，这要归功于其在该领域的30年经 验。该公司旨在解决环境问题，并参与多个研究项目， 以寻找具有挑战性的解决方案。
The aims of the company are designing, manufacturing and selling instruments for the measurement and the monitoring of oceans and fresh waters. The top one priority of NKE Instrumentation is to be involved in the understanding of the blue lung of the planet by developing smart high-tech products. The fields of applications are rivers, lakes, estuaries, oceans and deep sea. There are three distinct ranges of products. Underwater monitoring instruments that are products designed to measure in-situ the main physicochemical parameters of fresh and sea water. Buoys and instrumented systems aim to measure, transmit and retrieve data in any type of environment. Profiling floats are used for oceanographic and environmental studies of the evolution of oceans and climate. NKE Instrumentation is though involved in the international ARGO program to supply temperature and salinity profiling floats. NKE Instrumentation is a leading provider of water monitoring solutions thanks to its 30 years of experience in this field. The company aims solving environmental issues and be involved in several research projects in order to find challenging solutions.

The reinforced hollow fiber filter membrane independently developed by the company is an ideal new-generation membrane product suitable for the current membrane bioreactor （MBR） and submerged ultrafiltration system. With extremely high strength, higher separation accuracy and operating flux, it can safely and efficiently remove suspended particulates and most harmful substances such as bacteria in water. It can be widely used in municipal sewage, industrial wastewater, printing and dyeing wastewater, pharmaceutical wastewater, landfill leachate, and material separation and concentration extraction. We have many kinds of membranes include: UF membrane, RO membrane, NF membrane, MBR and Purification System processing equipment. The company's large- scale production, product quality and performance have reached the international advanced level. and foreign customers. “七二五所”）成立于1961年，隶属中国船舶集团有 限公司，是专业从事舰船材料与工艺及应用性研究的军 工科研事业单位，在五十多年的发展历程中，为海军武 器装备发展和国民经济建设做出了重要贡献。军工科研 方面：七二五所是海军各型号的材料技术责任单位，构 建了海军武器装备的基本材料体系，有效保证了装备工 程对材料技术的需求，为海军武器装备研制提供了强有 力的材料技术支撑，是我国舰船装备发展的中坚力量。
科技产业方面：七二五所乗承“精诚团结、求实创新、 志存高远、追求卓越”的精神，坚持“科技为本、创新 跨越、军民融合、做强产业”的方针，致力于构建“国 内领先、国际一流的集科研和多个高技术产业为一体的 高科技产业集团”，持续推进科技成果转化和高新技术 产业化，初步建成了领先的高科技产业集团。
